item.title: Total lack of road markings, 12th June
item.description:
The road markings through the chicanes are virtually non-existent and many drivers do not keep to their side of the road. This is dangerous. On two occasions today drivers of oncoming cars have driven straight through and forced me to brake suddenly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect Times on EV Sign, 12th June
item.description:
The sign says that you can stay there for up to 4 hours, but ESB stipulate that you can only stay for 1 hour, which is the typical limit for other locations. I received an overstay fee (around Â£33) for staying here for approximately 2 hours and 36 minutes, believing I could due to the sign.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Horseferry Road, Millbank, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Street Light, 12th June

item.title: Another Fly tip, 12th June

item.description:

item.title: Outside 42 Avenue Road, NW8 6HS, 12th June
item.description:
A protected tree has been severely pollarded in the last fortnight. Worried this work is authorised by Camden but carried out by residents of the street (wanting more sunlight on their property, perhaps?). Please confirm it is official work, done for a legitimate reason.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Avenue Road, Belsize Park, London
